name: Anjali Verma
comment: As an engineering student, money's always tight. 'Student's Choice' is really helpful! It tells us about different shops nearby that give student discounts, so they automatically become my top choice for eating out. Plus, it even takes you straight to Google Maps, so finding the place is super easy. Definitely saves both money and time!

name: Sameer Joshi
comment: What I like is that it's simple. It shows you which shops give discounts to students, making them the go-to options. And the Google Maps link is really useful for finding the exact location without any hassle. Makes deciding where to eat between classes super easy and reliable.

name: Rohan Patel
comment: NIT life can be hectic. 'Student's Choice' makes it easier to find good food deals around campus. Knowing which shops offer student discounts makes them the first ones I think of. And the direct link to Google Maps is a lifesaver for finding new places quickly. Helps save a bit of money and makes things convenient!
